EmailTemplate.description: When Kickbox Batch is in running that time this email template will use for email notifications to the all user which are in Kikbox API setting.
EmailTemplate.name: Leads Batch_In_Progress
EmailTemplate.subject: Kickbox Verification Batch Run failed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Kickbox verification for the Leads and Contacts are in progress.
For complete information please find the below record. URL of the record : URL_Record
Thank you.
